name: Hannah & Henry
description:
Hannah & Henry is an episodic narrative-driven game set in the fictional seaside city of Parlamer. Follow the exploits of Hannah, a mentee witch under the tutelage of her black cat Henry (né Goober), as she learns the zany basics of a kind of magic that's not about pointing wands or uttering fancy phrases. With the help of a flippant fluffy feline, Hannah will master the spookiest of crafts.



In this first chapter, Hannah will learn about the reality of witchcraft and master the exhausting musical art of casting spells.

That includes slow, simple spells that have a limited effect.


And faster, complex spells which are more versatile and powerful.


Photosensitivity Warning: A small percentage of people may experience seizures when exposed to certain lights, patterns, or images, even with no history of epilepsy or seizures.
